statements: SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_id, project_description, project_status FROM GreenBuildingProjects ORDER BY project_status DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_status = 'Planned' ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe' AND project_status = 'In Progress'
SELECT project_name, project_manager, project_status FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_manager LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY project_status DESC
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress'
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM GreenBuildingProjects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM ProjectMembers WHERE member_role = 'Architect' ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM GreenBuildingProjects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProjectMembers JOIN GreenBuildingProjects ON ProjectMembers.project_id = GreenBuildingProjects.project_id;
SELECT member_name, member_role, project_name FROM ProjectMembers JOIN GreenBuildingProjects ON ProjectMembers.project_id = GreenBuildingProjects.project_id WHERE member_role = 'Architect';
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, architect_name FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE architect_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM ProjectTeam ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_status FROM ProjectTasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, architect_name FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_description, architect_name FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE architect_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ProjectTeam WHERE team_lead = 'John Doe';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM ProjectTasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, construction_company FROM GreenBuildingProjects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_leader FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM ProjectTasks;
SELECT task_name, task_assignee, task_status FROM ProjectTasks;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT project_name, project_leader FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ProjectTasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_status FROM GreenBuildingProjects JOIN ProjectTasks ON GreenBuildingProjects.project_id = ProjectTasks.project_id;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_role LIKE '%Engineer%';
SELECT * FROM TaskComments WHERE comment_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM Green_Building_Projects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM Green_Building_Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM Project_Tasks WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT team_name, team_role FROM Project_Team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT member_name FROM Team_Members WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM Green_Building_Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Project_Tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description, t.task_name FROM Green_Building_Projects p JOIN Project_Tasks t ON p.project_id = t.project_id WHERE t.task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT m.member_name, t.team_name FROM Team_Members m JOIN Project_Team t ON m.team_id = t.team_id WHERE t.team_id = 3;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM Project_Documents pd JOIN Green_Building_Projects p ON pd.project_id = p.project_id WHERE p.project_location LIKE '%City%';
